hibernate-mapping.query: select si1.token.processInstance from org.jbpm.context.exe.variableinstance.StringInstance si1, org.jbpm.context.exe.variableinstance.StringInstance si2 where si1.token = si2.token and si1.name = 'documentId' and si2.name = 'documentRepositoryName' and si1.value = :docId and si2.value = :repoId

select t from org.jbpm.context.exe.variableinstance.StringInstance si1, org.jbpm.context.exe.variableinstance.StringInstance si2, org.jbpm.taskmgmt.exe.TaskInstance t where si1.id member of t.variableInstances and si1.name = 'documentId' and si2.name = 'documentRepositoryName' and si1.value = :docId and si2.value = :repoId
